    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer​(Customer customer, Manager admin) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to add a customer to the bank
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be added
      admin - the manager adding the customer to the bank
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if admin is not a manager, if the customer is null, and if the customer already exists

    • addCustomer

      Use to add a customer to the bank
      Parameters:
      username - the username for the new Customer
      password - the password for the new Customer
      admin - the Manager that is creating the new Customer
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if admin is not a manager, if the customer is null, and if the customer already exists

      Throws:

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount​(Customer customer, double initialBalance, Manager admin) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to add a new account to the bank
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer that is associated to the new account
      initialBalance - the initial balance of the new account
      admin - the Manager that is creating the new Manager
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if admin is not a manager, if the customer is null, and if the initial balance is less than 0

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount​(Account account, Manager admin) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to remove an account from the bank
      Parameters:
      account - the account to be removed from the bank
      admin - the Manager that is removing the account from the bank
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the admin is not a manager, if the account is null

    • makeDeposit

      public void makeDeposit​(Account account, User user, double amount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to make a deposit into a customers account
      Parameters:
      account - the account that funds are to be added to
      user - the user that is associated to the account
      amount - the amount of money to be deposited into the account
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the user does not exist, if the account does not exist, and any exceptions thrown from the account object

    • makeWithdraw

      Parameters:
      account - the account that funds with be withdrawn from
      user - the user that is associated with the account
      amount - the amount of funds to be withdrawn
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the user does not exist, if the account does not exist, and any exceptions thrown from the account object

      account - the account that funds will be removed from
      user - the user that is associated with the account
      amount - the amount of funds to be removed
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the user does not exists, if the account does not exist, and any exceptions thrown from the account object
